医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
GLP-1 药物被发现可降低糖尿病患者患癌症的风险研究发现，与胰岛素相比，GLP-1 受体激动剂可显着降低 2 型糖尿病患者患 13 种与肥胖相关的癌症中的 10 种的风险，但与二甲双胍相比，效果不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/GLP-1-drugs-found-to-lower-cancer-risk-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/GLP-1-drugs-found-to-lower-cancer-risk-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e32e0b8-cb9b-4b0e-aa1a-dc37d0d7d129 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 22:22:00 -0400 GLP-1 drugs found to lower cancer risk in diabetes patients
终生低LDL-C水平是预防心血管疾病的关键研究表明，随着时间的推移，保持低 LDL-C 水平可以减少斑块积聚，并通过减缓动脉粥样硬化进展来降低 ASCVD 风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Lifelong-low-LDL-C-levels-key-to-preventing-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Lifelong-low-LDL-C-levels-key-to-preventing-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2d6af5c-a92e-4076-a448-e6ae0a485f0d Mon, 08 Jul 2024 22:00:00 -0400 Lifelong low LDL-C levels key to preventing cardiovascular disease
索马鲁肽和极低热量饮食组合在控制 2 型糖尿病方面显示出优异的效果诺丁汉大学的一项研究表明，将索马鲁肽与极低热量饮食相结合可显着改善 2 型糖尿病患者的体重减轻和血糖控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Semaglutide-and-very-low-calorie-diet-combo-shows-superior-results-in-managing-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Semaglutide-and-very-low-calorie-diet-combo-shows-superior-results-in-managing-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31dbe15e-9b3e-4d37-877b-c855b4eac04b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 21:02:00 -0400 Semaglutide and very-low calorie diet combo shows superior results in managing type 2 diabetes
新技术揭示了睡眠在婴儿大脑发育中的关键作用研究人员开发了先进的技术来测量新生儿的睡眠模式，揭示睡眠如何显着影响出生前后的大脑发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-technology-reveals-the-ritic-role-of-sleep-in-infant-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-technology-reveals-the-ritic-role-of-sleep-in-infant-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4da7902-1a52-484e-bbf3-6dc495b753ad Mon, 08 Jul 2024 20:31:00 -0400 New technology reveals the critical role of sleep in infant brain development
新工具预测乳腺癌治疗造成的神经损伤风险许多使用紫杉烷类药物（一种细胞抑制药物）治疗乳腺癌的女性经常会出现神经系统副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-tool-predicts-nerve-damage-risk-from-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-tool-predicts-nerve-damage-risk-from-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=760f9d1b-5616-4b95-92fa-0dffa8426b90 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:46:38 -0400 New tool predicts nerve damage risk from breast cancer treatment
研究强调女性新兵缺铁的情况显着增加经过五个月的基础军事训练后，女新兵缺铁的比例增加了一倍多，从25%增加到55%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-highlights-marked-increase-in-iron-deficiency-among-female-military-recruits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-highlights-marked-increase-in-iron-deficiency-among-female-military-recruits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bd00b19-66df-4e55-814c-4d83b48d0e1b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:37:38 -0400 Study highlights marked increase in iron deficiency among female military recruits
妊娠携带者的孕产妇发病率和妊娠风险更高根据今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上公布的新研究，与自然受孕或通过体外受精 (IVF) 受孕的女性相比，代孕妈妈（也称为代孕妈妈）发生严重孕产妇疾病和不良妊娠结局的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Maternal-morbidity-and-pregnancy-risks-higher-for-gestational-riers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Maternal-morbidity-and-pregnancy-risks-higher-for-gestational-riers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eab8c3f8-76cf-4c59-8a7c-77aef1fb2bb6 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:19:04 -0400 Maternal morbidity and pregnancy risks higher for gestational carriers
女军人和女性家庭成员面临更高的慢性疼痛风险布莱根妇女医院的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，女军人和女性家庭成员患慢性疼痛的风险明显更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Military-women-and-female-family-members-face-higher-risks-of-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Military-women-and-female-family-members-face-higher-risks-of-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1892fb63-be47-45eb-b04d-f6a9129f6d9c Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:10:44 -0400 Military women and female family members face higher risks of chronic pain
了解医药促销活动在医疗保健领域的影响力由制药行业主办的针对负责处方药物的卫生专业人员（例如医生和执业护士）的促销活动是新药和设备促销活动的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-reach-of-pharmaceutical-promotional-events-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-reach-of-pharmaceutical-promotional-events-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=477e6db9-deee-43b2-9e42-c2c93547cb01 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 15:04:33 -0400 Understanding the reach of pharmaceutical promotional events in healthcare
密切合作帮助患有癌症的儿童Paul Scherrer 研究所 PSI 和苏黎世大学儿童医院之间的密切合作始于 20 年前，旨在造福癌症儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/A-close-collaboration-to-help-children-suffering-from-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/A-close-collaboration-to-help-children-suffering-from-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af5c7864-77ae-4e0f-b7ba-e1269b16533d Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:45:29 -0400 A close collaboration to help children suffering from cancer
